Protocols/VGSExpDateConfigurationProtoco.name: VGSExpDateConfigurationProtocol
Protocols/VGSExpDateConfigurationProtoco.abstract: Attributes required to configure date format and input source for field with type .expDate.

Enums/VGSTokenizationResponse.html.name: VGSTokenizationResponse
Enums/VGSTokenizationResponse.html.abstract: Tokenization response enum cases for SDK requests.

Enums/VGSVaultAliasFormat.html.name: VGSVaultAliasFormat
Enums/VGSVaultAliasFormat.html.abstract: Type of Alias format. Read more about avaliable formats: https://www.verygoodsecurity.com/docs/terminology/nomenclature#alias-formats .

Classes/VGSCVCTokenizationConfiguration..name: VGSCVCTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSCVCTokenizationConfiguration..abstract: VGSCVCTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with type .cvc, required for work with tokenization api.

Classes/VGSCardHolderNameTokenizationCon.name: VGSCardHolderNameTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSCardHolderNameTokenizationCon.abstract: VGSCardHolderNameTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with type .cardHolderName, required for work with tokenization api.

Classes/VGSCardNumberTokenizationConfigu.name: VGSCardNumberTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSCardNumberTokenizationConfigu.abstract: VGSCardTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with type .cardNumber, required for work with tokenization api.

Classes/VGSExpDateTokenizationConfigurat.name: VGSExpDateTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSExpDateTokenizationConfigurat.abstract: VGSExpDateTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with type .expDate, required for work with tokenization api.

Classes/VGSSSNTokenizationConfiguration..name: VGSSSNTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSSSNTokenizationConfiguration..abstract: VGSSSNTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with type .ssn, required for work with tokenization api.

Classes/VGSTokenizationConfiguration.htm.name: VGSTokenizationConfiguration
Classes/VGSTokenizationConfiguration.htm.abstract: VGSTokenizationConfiguration - textfield configuration for textfield with any type of data, required for work with tokenization api.

Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.name: flatJSON
Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.abstract: Map fieldName to JSON without applying any transformations.

Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.name: nestedJSONWithArrayMerge
Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.abstract: Map field name to nested JSON and array if array index is specified.

Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.name: nestedJSONWithArrayOverwrite
Enums/VGSCollectFieldNameMappingPolicy.h.abstract: Map field name to nested JSON and array if array index is specified.

Structs/VGSCollectLoggingConfiguration.h.name: isNetworkDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSCollectLoggingConfiguration.h.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to record VGSCollectSDK network session with success/failed requests. Default is false.

Structs/VGSCollectLoggingConfiguration.h.name: isExtensiveDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSCollectLoggingConfiguration.h.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Classes/VGSCollectLogger.html.name: VGSCollectLogger
Classes/VGSCollectLogger.html.abstract: VGSCollectLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSCollectSDK. Use .configuration property to setup these options. VGSCollectLogger logging implies only printing logs to Xcode console. It doesn’t save logs to persistent store/local file, also it doesn’t send debugging logs to backend services.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataI.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataIsNotValid
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataI.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be not empty or to be valid only, but is not valid.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataR.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataRequired
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataR.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be not empty but is empty or nil.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataR.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataRequiredValid
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorInputDataR.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be valid is not valid.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileNotFou.name: VGSSDKErrorFileNotFound
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileNotFou.abstract: Error key, used for errors when SDK can’t find the file at file path. Can happened when file changes the path or doesn’t exist.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileTypeNo.name: VGSSDKErrorFileTypeNotSupported
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileTypeNo.abstract: Error key, used for errors when file type is not supported by SDK.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileSizeEx.name: VGSSDKErrorFileSizeExceedsTheLimit
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorFileSizeEx.abstract: Error key, used for errors when file size exceeds maximum limit.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorSourceNotA.name: VGSSDKErrorSourceNotAvailable
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorSourceNotA.abstract: Error key, used for errors when SDK can’t get access to specific source.

Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorUnexpected.name: VGSSDKErrorUnexpectedResponseDataFormat
Error%20Keys.html#/VGSSDKErrorUnexpected.abstract: Error key, used for errors when response for SDK API request is in format that not supported by SDK.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/inputDataIsNotV.name: inputDataIsNotValid
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/inputDataIsNotV.abstract: When input data is not valid, but required to be valid

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/inputFileSizeEx.name: inputFileSizeExceedsTheLimit
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/inputFileSizeEx.abstract: When file size is larger then allowed limit

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/sourceNotAvaila.name: sourceNotAvailable
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/sourceNotAvaila.abstract: When can’t get access to file source

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/unexpectedRespo.name: unexpectedResponseDataFormat
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/unexpectedRespo.abstract: When reponse data format is not supported

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/invalidConfigur.name: invalidConfigurationURL
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/invalidConfigur.abstract: When VGS config URL is not valid.

Classes/VGSError.html.name: VGSError
Classes/VGSError.html.abstract: An error produced by VGSCollectSDK. Works similar to default NSError in iOS.

Errors.html#/VGSCollectSDKErrorDomain.name: VGSCollectSDKErrorDomain
Errors.html#/VGSCollectSDKErrorDomain.abstract: An error domain string used to produce VGSError from VGSCollectSDK - “vgscollect.sdk”

Structs/VGSValidationRulePaymentCard.htm.name: validateUnknownCardBrand
Structs/VGSValidationRulePaymentCard.htm.abstract: Turn on/off validation of cards that are not defined in SDK - CardBrand.unknown

Structs/VGSValidationRuleLengthMatch.htm.name: VGSValidationRuleLengthMatch
Structs/VGSValidationRuleLengthMatch.htm.abstract: Validate input in scope of multiple lengths, e.x.: [16, 19].

Structs/VGSValidationRulePattern.html.name: VGSValidationRulePattern
Structs/VGSValidationRulePattern.html.abstract: Validate input in scope of matching the pattern(regex).

Structs/VGSValidationRulePaymentCard.htm.name: VGSValidationRulePaymentCard
Structs/VGSValidationRulePaymentCard.htm.abstract: Validate input in scope of matching supported card brands, available lengths and checkSum algorithms.

Structs/VGSValidationRuleLuhnCheck.html.name: VGSValidationRuleLuhnCheck
Structs/VGSValidationRuleLuhnCheck.html.abstract: Validate input in scope of matching Luhn algorithm.

Structs/VGSValidationRuleCardExpirationD.name: VGSValidationRuleCardExpirationDate
Structs/VGSValidationRuleCardExpirationD.abstract: Validate input in scope of matching card expiration date format and time range.

Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.name: monthFieldName
Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.abstract: Field Name that will be used as a JSON key with month value from expDate string on send request.

Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.name: yearFieldName
Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.abstract: Field Name that will be used as a JSON key with year value from expDate string on send request.

Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.name: VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer
Structs/VGSExpDateSeparateSerializer.htm.abstract: Expiration Date Separate serializer, split date string to components with separate fieldNames

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: regex
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Regex validating that input contains digits only.

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Valid Unknown Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by CheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: formatPattern
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Unknown Payment Card Numbers visual format pattern. NOTE: format pattern length limits input length.

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: brandIcon
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Image, associated with Unknown Payment Card Brands.

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html#.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Unknown Payment Card Brands.

Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.name: regex
Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.abstract: Regex Pattern required to detect Payment Card Brand

Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.abstract: Valid Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by CheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSCustomPaymentCardModel.html#/.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Payment Card Brand.

Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/regex.name: regex
Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/regex.abstract: Regex Pattern required to detect Payment Card Brand

Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/cvcLen.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/cvcLen.abstract: Valid Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/checkS.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/checkS.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by CheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/cvcIco.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSPaymentCardModel.html#/cvcIco.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Payment Card Brand.

Classes/VGSPaymentCards/CardBrand.html#/.name: custom(brandName:)
Classes/VGSPaymentCards/CardBrand.html#/.abstract: Custom Payment Card Brand. Should have unique brandName.

Classes/VGSPaymentCards/CardBrand.html#/.name: cardLengths
Classes/VGSPaymentCards/CardBrand.html#/.abstract: Returns array with valid card number lengths for specific VGSPaymentCards.CardBrand

Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html#/unknown.name: unknown
Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html#/unknown.abstract: Unknown Brand Payment Card Model. Can be used for specifing cards details when VGSValidationRulePaymentCard requires validating CardBrand.unknown cards.

Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html#/validCardB.name: validCardBrands
Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html#/validCardB.abstract: An array of valid Card Brands, could include custom and default brands. If not set, will use availableCardBrands array instead.

Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html.name: VGSPaymentCards
Classes/VGSPaymentCards.html.abstract: Class responsible for storing and managing Payment Cards in SDK.

Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html.name: VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel
Structs/VGSUnknownPaymentCardModel.html.abstract: An object representing Unknown Payment Cards - cards not defined in the SDK. Object is used when validation forCardBrand.unknown is set as true. Check VGSValidationRulePaymentCard for more details. Validation attributes can be edited through `VGSPaymentCards.unknown model.

Structs/VGSCollectRequestOptions.html#/f.name: fieldNameMappingPolicy
Structs/VGSCollectRequestOptions.html#/f.abstract: Defines how to map fieldNames to JSON. Default is .nestedJSON.

Classes/CardState.html#/last4.name: last4
Classes/CardState.html#/last4.abstract: Last 4 digits of the valid card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/bin.name: bin
Classes/CardState.html#/bin.abstract: Bin digits of the valid card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/cardBrand.name: cardBrand
Classes/CardState.html#/cardBrand.abstract: Credit Card Brand of the card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/description.name: description
Classes/CardState.html#/description.abstract: Message that contains CardState attributes and their values.

Classes/SSNState.html#/last4.name: last4
Classes/SSNState.html#/last4.abstract: Last 4 digits of the valid ssn from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.ssn.

Classes/SSNState.html#/description.name: description
Classes/SSNState.html#/description.abstract: Message that contains SSNState attributes and their values.

Classes/State.html#/validationErrors.name: validationErrors
Classes/State.html#/validationErrors.abstract: Array of VGSValidationError. Should be empty when textfield input is valid.

Classes/State.html#/description.name: description
Classes/State.html#/description.abstract: Message that contains State attributes and their values

Enums/Environment.html#/sandbox.name: sandbox
Enums/Environment.html#/sandbox.abstract: Should be used for development and testing purpose.

Classes/VGSCollect.html#/sendData(path:m.name: sendData(path:method:routeId:extraData:requestOptions:completion:)
Classes/VGSCollect.html#/sendData(path:m.abstract: Send data from VGSTextFields to your organization vault.

Classes/VGSCollect.html#/sendFile(path:m.name: sendFile(path:method:routeId:extraData:completion:)
Classes/VGSCollect.html#/sendFile(path:m.abstract: Send file to your organization vault. Only send one file at a time.

Classes/VGSCollect.html#/tokenizeData(ro.name: tokenizeData(routeId:completion:)
Classes/VGSCollect.html#/tokenizeData(ro.abstract: Makes tokenization response with data from VGSTextFields.

Classes/VGSCollect.html.name: VGSCollect
Classes/VGSCollect.html.abstract: An object you use for observing VGSTextField State and send data to your organization vault.

Classes/State.html.name: State
Classes/State.html.abstract: An object that describes VGSTextField state. State attributes are read-only.

Classes/SSNState.html.name: SSNState
Classes/SSNState.html.abstract: An object that describes VGSTextField state with configuration FieldType.ssn . State attributes are read-only.

Classes/CardState.html.name: CardState
Classes/CardState.html.abstract: An object that describes VGSTextField state with configuration FieldType.cardNumber . State attributes are read-only.

Observe%20State%20and%20Send%20Data.html.name: JsonData
Observe%20State%20and%20Send%20Data.html.abstract: Key-value data type, usually used for response format.

Observe%20State%20and%20Send%20Data.html.name: HTTPHeaders
Observe%20State%20and%20Send%20Data.html.abstract: Key-value data type, used in http request headers.

Protocols/VGSFilePickerControllerDelegat.name: filePickingFailedWithError(_:)
Protocols/VGSFilePickerControllerDelegat.abstract: On error occured when user pick a file.

Classes/VGSFilePickerConfiguration.html#.name: fieldName
Classes/VGSFilePickerConfiguration.html#.abstract: Name that will be associated with selected file by user. Used as a JSON key on send request with file data to your organozation vault.

Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html#/de.name: delegate
Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html#/de.abstract: VGSFilePickerControllerDelegate - handle user interaction on file picking.

Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html.name: VGSFilePickerController
Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html.abstract: Controller responsible for importing files from device sources.

Enums/VGSFileSource.html.name: VGSFileSource
Enums/VGSFileSource.html.abstract: Available file source destinations that VGSFilePickerController can work with.

Classes/VGSFileInfo.html.name: VGSFileInfo
Classes/VGSFileInfo.html.abstract: An object that holds optional files’ metadata on selecting file through VGSFilePickerController.

Enums/FieldType.html#/none.name: none
Enums/FieldType.html#/none.abstract: Field type that doesn’t require any input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/cardNumber.name: cardNumber
Enums/FieldType.html#/cardNumber.abstract: Field type that requires Credit Card Number input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/expDate.name: expDate
Enums/FieldType.html#/expDate.abstract: Field type that requires Expiration Date input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/cvc.name: cvc
Enums/FieldType.html#/cvc.abstract: Field type that requires Credit Card CVC input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/cardHolderName.name: cardHolderName
Enums/FieldType.html#/cardHolderName.abstract: Field type that requires Cardholder Name input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/ssn.name: ssn
Enums/FieldType.html#/ssn.abstract: Field type that requires US Social Security Number input formatting and validation.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/vgsCollec.name: vgsCollector
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/vgsCollec.abstract: Collect form that will be assiciated with VGSTextField.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/fieldName.name: fieldName
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/fieldName.abstract: Name that will be associated with VGSTextField and used as a JSON key on send request with textfield data to your organozation vault.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/isRequire.name: isRequired
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/isRequire.abstract: Set if VGSTextField is required to be non-empty and non-nil on send request. Default is false.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/isRequire.name: isRequiredValidOnly
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/isRequire.abstract: Set if VGSTextField is required to be valid only on send request. Default is false.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/formatPat.name: formatPattern
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/formatPat.abstract: Input data visual format pattern. If not applied, will be set by default depending on field type.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/divider.name: divider
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/divider.abstract: String, used to replace not default VGSConfiguration.formatPattern characters in input text on send request.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/keyboardT.name: keyboardType
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/keyboardT.abstract: Preferred UIKeyboardType for VGSTextField. If not applied, will be set by default depending on field type parameter.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/keyboardA.name: keyboardAppearance
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/keyboardA.abstract: Preferred UIKeyboardAppearance for textfield. By default is UIKeyboardAppearance.default.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/validatio.name: validationRules
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/validatio.abstract: Validation rules for field input. Defines State.isValide result.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/maxInputL.name: maxInputLength
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/maxInputL.abstract: Max input length. IMPORTANT! Can conflict with .formatPattern attribute.

Protocols/VGSTextFieldDelegate.html#/vgs.name: vgsTextFieldDidEndEditingOnReturn(_:)
Protocols/VGSTextFieldDelegate.html#/vgs.abstract: VGSTextField did resign first responder on Return button pressed.

Classes/VGSCardTextField/CardIconLocatio.name: left
Classes/VGSCardTextField/CardIconLocatio.abstract: Card brand icon at left side of VGSCardTextField.

Classes/VGSCardTextField/CardIconLocatio.name: right
Classes/VGSCardTextField/CardIconLocatio.abstract: Card brand icon at right side of VGSCardTextField.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textAlignment.name: textAlignment
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textAlignment.abstract: The technique to use for aligning the text.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/clearButtonMo.name: clearButtonMode
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/clearButtonMo.abstract: Sets when the clear button shows up. Default is UITextField.ViewMode.never

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/isSecureTextE.name: isSecureTextEntry
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/isSecureTextE.abstract: Identifies whether the text object should disable text copying and in some cases hide the text being entered. Default is false.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/adjustsFontFo.name: adjustsFontForContentSizeCategory
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/adjustsFontFo.abstract: Indicates whether VGSTextField should automatically update its font when the device’s UIContentSizeCategory is changed.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/autocorrectio.name: autocorrectionType
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/autocorrectio.abstract: Determines whether autocorrection is enabled or disabled during typing.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textFieldAcce.name: textFieldAccessibilityLabel
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textFieldAcce.abstract: A succinct label in a localized string that identifies the accessibility text field.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textFieldAcce.name: textFieldAccessibilityHint
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/textFieldAcce.abstract: A localized string that contains a brief description of the result of performing an action on the accessibility text field.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/isContentEqua.name: isContentEqual(_:)
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/isContentEqua.abstract: Check if input text in two textfields is same. Returns Bool.

Classes/VGSTextField.html.name: VGSTextField
Classes/VGSTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area in user interface.

Classes/VGSCardTextField.html.name: VGSCardTextField
Classes/VGSCardTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area. Can be use instead of a VGSTextField when need to detect and show credit card brand images.

Classes/VGSExpDateTextField.html.name: VGSExpDateTextField
Classes/VGSExpDateTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area. Can be use instead of a VGSTextField when need to show picker view with Card Number Expiration Month and Year.

Classes/VGSCVCTextField.html.name: VGSCVCTextField
Classes/VGSCVCTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area. Can be use instead of a VGSTextField when need to show CVC/CVV images for credit card brands.

Classes/VGSExpDateConfiguration.html.name: VGSExpDateConfiguration
Classes/VGSExpDateConfiguration.html.abstract: A class responsible for configuration VGSTextField with fieldType = .expDate. Extends VGSConfiguration class.
